creditline: Courtesy of the Science Museum of Minnesota
description: a beaded panel runs the outer length of each legging; panel is mostly light blue with red, yellow and dark blue geometric pattern; fringe along outer seams; blue ovals and red pigment both sides of legging "b"; red ovals and yellow pigment on both sides of legging "a"
dimension:
34 x 14 in. (86.36 x 35.56 cm) (a: proper right)
34 x 14 3/4 in. (86.36 x 37.47 cm) (b: proper left)
medium: animal hide, glass beads, cotton cloth, cotton thread, sinew, pigment
title: Pair of Man's Leggings
